sentences.english: They look too contrived--and buying separates is much more affordable.
sentences.chinese: 因爲套裝看上去太做作，分開買更實惠些。

sentences.english: "compare the price with several shops, it's boon like buying vegetable in the market".
sentences.chinese: 貨比三家還有東西送，跟菜市場買菜一樣實惠。

sentences.english: Food is an affordable medicine for all of us.
sentences.chinese: 對我們所有人來說，食物是一種最實惠的藥補方式。

sentences.english: But it would be a lot cheaper than flying 1m special missions.
sentences.chinese: 但是，比起100萬的特殊任務實惠多了。

sentences.english: These devices are also affordable and therefore the value proposition cannot be ignored.
sentences.chinese: 這些設備還價格實惠，因此該價值主張不容忽視。

sentences.english: Think about the benefit of old books on the shop, taste all dark alex also stay airflow.
sentences.chinese: 想想網店上那實惠的舊書，嚐盡甜頭也留得半世風流。

sentences.english: On the opposite side of the street was a little restaurant for people with large appetites and modest purses.
sentences.chinese: 在街道對面有個小飯店，量大實惠，中檔消費。

sentences.english: To develop affordable surfactants and oil displacement systems is the key.
sentences.chinese: 研製出經濟實惠的表面活性劑和驅油體系是關鍵。

sentences.english: For most of the people more parise than pudding .
sentences.chinese: 對大多數人來說，寧要實惠不要恭維。

sentences.english: Often you'll get a better deal for buying in bulk too.
sentences.chinese: 買散裝商品常常會更實惠。

sentences.english: Tableware made of stainless steel is economical and practical and ADDS luster to your table.
sentences.chinese: 不鏽鋼餐具，經濟實惠，爲您的餐桌增添光彩。

sentences.english: The Patent produce unique type exclusive production lowest price.
sentences.chinese: 專利產品獨特外型獨家生產經濟實惠。

sentences.english: My car equals yours in economy.
sentences.chinese: 我的車在經濟實惠方面比得上你的車。

sentences.english: Plus, I always get the feeling that those Glad or Tupperware containers are overpriced anyway.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我總是覺得格拉德或特百惠的器皿不實惠。

sentences.english: The battery is great, intenet as well.
American households also benefit from the freedom to choose imports from around the world.
sentences.chinese: 美國家庭也從自由選擇全球進口商品中得到實惠。

definition: reasonably priced/inexpensive/to keep prices down/(currency exchange) parity
in touch with the people/sensitive to people's needs
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
